translations: 致力于，投身于；把……用于，作……专用；<古>降祸于，诅咒（devote 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He is an active member of the school's stamp club, devoting most of his sparing time to stamp collecting.
sentences.translation: 他是学校集邮俱乐部的一位活跃会员，将他大部分的空闲时间用在集邮上。

sentences.sentence: Success is the result of devoting your time and energy to what you've set out to do, which doesn't happen by accident.
sentences.translation: 成功是投入时间和精力到你着手做的事情上的结果，它不会是偶然发生的。

sentences.sentence: We can reduce our overall drill bit production costs by devoting the Cookville factory entirely to drill bit production.
sentences.translation: 我们可以通过把 Cookville 工厂全部投入到钻头生产中来降低钻头生产成本。
